columns.name: Bus_orgId
columns.description: Primary Key (  Mimics behavior from ORG_IDS_ID in WFAN) DOES NOT contain all previous versions of the org path which are currently active.  - Should be used for all joins to detail fact Views.

columns.name: Bus_orgName
columns.description: Name of the Org Node as entered in WFD (single value)

columns.name: Bus_orgFullName
columns.description: Full Name of the Org Node as entered in WFD (single value)

columns.name: Bus_orgDescription
columns.description: Description of the Org Node as entered in WFD (single value)

columns.name: Bus_orgEffectiveDate
columns.description: Effective date of the current record (Should not be used for joins)

columns.name: Bus_orgExpirationDate
columns.description: Expiration date of the current record (Should not be used for joins)

columns.name: Bus_orgTypeId
columns.description: Org Type(ID) in the Business Structure that this node is configured.

columns.name: Bus_orgTypeName
columns.description: Org Type(Name) in the Business Structure that this node is configured.

columns.name: Bus_orgPathTxt
columns.description: Full path in the business structure down to this node.

columns.name: Bus_orgContextName
columns.description: Can only be ORG or FORECAST

columns.name: Bus_orgLocationCategory
columns.description: Category, Department, or Site,   used for Forecasting (Retail)

columns.name: Bus_orgBreak0
columns.description:
Name of Business Structure Location based on Location type mappings in Data Hub configuration. 
This is ALWAYS the CATEGORY level of the business structure (For Volume Only)

columns.name: Bus_orgBreak1
columns.description:
Name of Business Structure Location based on Location type mappings in Data Hub configuration. 
This is ALWAYS the JOB level of the business structure

columns.name: Bus_directWorkPercent
columns.description: Percentage of Work Hours considered to be direct.  Can be found in Dimensions Business Structure at the Job level called Direct Work Allocation

columns.name: Bus_indirectWorkPercent
columns.description: Percentage of Work Hours considered to be indirect.  Can be found in Dimensions Business Structure at the Job level called Indirect Work Allocation
